comment.body: Не повторяется. Какой сертификат использовал браузер? Можно посмотреть в меню `о сайте` и обратить внимание на иконку замка, либо в хроме в адресной строке - `Подключение защищено` - `данные сертификата`. Также можно проверить работу программы, перейдя по [этой ссылке](https://adguard.com/test.html).

issue.title: statsfa.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://statsfa.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatsfa.com%2F) ### Comment > Hello AdGuard Team, > > I hope you are doing well. > > I’ve encountered an issue when using AdGuard with the website statsfa.com > . The site does not display correctly due to AdGuard’s security settings. At first, I thought it might be a conflict with the Brave browser, but after further testing, I realized the issue occurs in all browsers. > > It seems that AdGuard interferes with this website (which is a WordPress statistics plugin), causing its CSS not to load at all and breaking the layout completely. > > I kindly ask you to look into this problem and provide a fix in future updates so the site can function properly. > > Thank you for your support and great work. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/a47b033gso8ows8k8s8o4owgo444gocfuisus6vh3s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/bi5oqe2as4ook0okgocs4oockos04kciabk8ls595w.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.139 MV3 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Brave Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880)

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

issue.title: www.fedex.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.fedex.com/secure-login/en-us](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fedex.com%2Fsecure-login%2Fen-us) ### Comment > FedEx site doesn't work properly with AdGuard macOS and HTTPS filtering. Even with the FedEx domains excluded from AdGuard, it still throws errors or loops logins. The behavior is different whether or not AdGuard is filtering FedEx, but is broken either way. > > * Logging in will either loop back to the landing page, throw an error, or redirect to signup saying the login is unavailable. > * Tracking a package will intermittently throw errors. > * The browser console is full of CORS errors. ``` Username: @zacharee ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/j5ys537dgkgg80go48cs88ccggg4w4sbit7164liu8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/jcwdbo37ba8ks08444o4ossc4884cwo6xyy7hmkg9g.png?nc=1)
